Uses of Transformer in com.myronmarston.music.transformers
 

Classes in com.myronmarston.music.transformers that implement Transformer
 class CopyTransformer
          Creates a copy of the input.
 class InversionTransformer
          Transformer that applies inversion to the given note list.
 class OctaveTransformer
          Transforms the given NoteList by moving it up or down some number of octaves.
 class RetrogradeTransformer
          Transformer that applies retrograde to the given NoteList.
 class RhythmicDurationTransformer
          Transformer that scales the the rhythmic duration of the notes by some scale factor.
 class SelfSimilarityTransformer
          Transformer that applies the self-similarity algorithm to the given NoteList.
 class TransposeTransformer
          Transformer that transposes the notes of the NoteList to a different pitch level.
 class VolumeTransformer
          Transformer that adjusts the volume of each note based on some scale factor.
